favourite.article: It's in the Son I have began, it's in the Son I'll onward go, in Him I'll walk, in Him I'll talk, in Him I'll surely grow.

Lord, I'm not strange, I just can't change It's not from lack of effort though The more I try, the more I find I need for You to grow.
Where I have failed, Lord You've prevailed The secret of success I know: That all I need is life indeed, I pray for You to grow.
As I go on, daily I see how much I lack, how much I fail, how much I really need to be transformed. But praise the Lord that all I need is Him! I just need life! I feel I always try so hard to change, but I really enjoy that what the Lord is saying to me is not "you need to change" but "you need to let Me grow in You!"; this is the secret. Lord, I pray for You to grow! I just need YOU.

In Him I'll surely grow..
Praise the Lord for this beautiful song..^^

The words in this hymn touched my heart because of the spiritual battle i was facing, i've been confused in the power of darkness, but because of the blood of Christ today I'm a new creation!!! if it had not been for the Lord on my side where would i be? I now walk in Him, talk in Him. in Him i will surely grow!!!

Amen. PTL that we have the blood of Christ which cleanses us from every sin. He is our sin offering!! I just love the hymn because even if our situation gets too hard, we must tell the Lord that we want Him to grow some more in us!!! Hallelujah!!!!
